author: Team Social
title: We all know the importance of maintaining a good oral hygiene. But mor
text:
We all know the importance of maintaining a good oral hygiene. But more often than not, we are a tad bit lazy to follow one.
But fear not, we have a new hero (not in a cape) who is giving us renewed reasons to floss. YUP!
Meet Dr Milad Shadrooh, otherwise known as The Singing Dentist and the Principal Dentist and owner of Chequers Dental in Basingstoke, United Kingdom.
So what does he sing about?
Oh well, he makes a lot of parody covers of popular songs, inspiring people to brush. And his latest cover of Ed Sheeran‚Äôs ‚ÄúShape of You‚Äù is totally winning the internet. With almost 20 million views so far, the singing dentist‚Äôs cover of ‚ÄúShape of You‚Äù can be the most effective commercial in dental history.
So watch the video here and tell us whether you are brushing by the end of it or not üòâ
